meanings.definition: Objects made of clay and hardened by heat.
meanings.sent1: I bought a beautiful pottery vase at the store.
meanings.sent2: She displayed her collection of pottery on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The pottery on the table looked like it was dancing in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her pottery creations were like little pieces of history frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The pottery glowed with warmth and craftsmanship.

meanings.definition: The art or craft of making objects out of clay.
meanings.sent1: Learning pottery requires patience and creativity.
meanings.sent2: The pottery class was full of students eager to learn.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at pottery ended up looking like a lopsided cake.
meanings.sent4: In her hands, pottery became a symphony of shapes and colors.
meanings.sent5: The pottery workshop buzzed with the sound of spinning wheels.

meanings.definition: The process of making objects out of clay.
meanings.sent1: Pottery involves shaping and firing clay in a kiln.
meanings.sent2: The pottery making process requires attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The pottery making machine hummed as it molded the clay.
meanings.sent4: The pottery process transformed raw materials into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The pottery studio smelled of earth and creativity.
